titleStmt.title: A proclamation, continuing the adjournment of the current Parliament, from the first Thursday of April next, to the twenty ninth of that month, 1686
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Additional imprint statement: This may be Reprinted at London, R.L.S. March the 29th. 1686. By E. Mallet.
At end of text: Given under our signet at Edinburgh, the two and twentieth day of March, 1686.
